code: import{createSlice,nanoid}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState=[];var betsSlice=createSlice({name:'bets',initialState:initialState,reducers:{pendingBetAdded:function pendingBetAdded(state,action){state.push(action.payload);},pendingBetRemoved:function pendingBetRemoved(state,action){return state.filter(function(element){return element.betID!==action.payload.betID;});},betStatusChanged:function betStatusChanged(state,action){var bet=state.find(function(element){return element.betID===action.payload.betID;});bet.betPending=!bet.betPending;}}});var _betsSlice$actions=betsSlice.actions,pendingBetAdded=_betsSlice$actions.pendingBetAdded,pendingBetRemoved=_betsSlice$actions.pendingBetRemoved,betStatusChanged=_betsSlice$actions.betStatusChanged;export{pendingBetAdded,pendingBetRemoved,betStatusChanged};export default betsSlice.reducer;
